name: Broken Taxi
description:
Game submited to GMTK Jam 2020

Fixed version -> https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1g_w2LoviLwdDpOMEeZln1KxROdsr1sFL?usp=sha...

Broken Taxi:

Your objective is to get the passengers and deliver to areas in the city deliver (any of the red buildings) BUT BE CAREFUL you're driving a broken taxi so your speed and direction might not be so reliable.


How to play:

W -> speed up 

S -> brake

A -> turn left

D -> turn right

H -> get passenger

J -> drop passenger

R -> restart level

ESC -> quit game
